message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you our amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $180.
I'm interested in the product, but $180 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $120 for it.
I understand your concerns, Bob, but I think the product is worth more than $120. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $160.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still not comfortable with $160. I'm willing to pay $140 for it.
I'm starting to think we're getting close, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $155.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $145 for it.
I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but I'm getting close to my minimum price. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $150.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $140 for it.
